name: Deno
description: "Deno is a secure runtime for JavaScript and TypeScript built with Rust. It was created by Ryan Dahl"

name: Biome
column6: formatter and bundler for full-stack development."

name: Tauri
description: "Tauri is a framework for building desktop applications with web technologies

name: Zed
column6: multiplayer code editor written in Rust."

name: Neon
description: "A library for writing native Node.js modules in Rust. It allows you to create high-performance Node.js add-ons easily."

name: Speedy Web Compiler
description: "A super-fast Javascript/Typescript compiler written in Rust. It can be used as a drop-in replacement for Babel in many cases."

name: Rocket
description: "Rocket is a web framework written in Rust that can be used to build backend services for JavaScript frontends."

name: Wasmer
description: "A WebAssembly runtime that can be used from both Rust and Javascript
column6: allowing you to run WebAssembly modules in various environments."

name: wasm-bindgen
description: "A tool that facilitates high-level interactions between Wasm modules and Javascript. It's often used when compiling Rust to WebAssembly."

name: Yew
description: "A modern web framework for creating multi-threaded front-end web apps using WebAssembly. It's written in Rust and uses concepts similar to React."

name: Parcel
description: "Parcel v2 bundler has been rewritten in Rust for improved performance."

name: ESBuild-RS
description: "Rust bindings for ESBuild. The Rust bindings allow for easy integration of ESBuild into Rust projects."
